item.description: Help Boston Rotaract sponsor micro loans in a big way by coming to John Harvard’s Brewhouse in Harvard Square on Sunday, February 13th at 5pm. Come alone and go on a series of "5 minute dates" or bring a date and hang out to help people all around the world get the finances they need to be entrepreneurs. A small raffle will also be held where there will be great prizes. Cost is only $10 per person at the door. Only ages 21 – 30 please for speed dating. For any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact Christina Stromberg at internationalservice@bostonrotaract.org

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Micro Dates for Micro Loans
